Title: "Custom Shape Projection for Azure Search: Shaping Skillsets"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfAdding a Shaper to a skillset lets you create a custom shape thatyou can project into table or blob storage. type": "#Microsoft.Azure.Search.CognitiveServicesByKey",         "description": "A Cognitive Services resource in the same region as Search.",         "key": "<COGNITIVE SERVICES All-in-ONE KEY>"     },     "knowledgeStore": null } Example Shaper skilltables. Creating a custom shape aggregates various elements into a new logical wholethat can be projected as a single table, or sliced and distributed across a collection oftables. In this example, the custom shape combines blob metadata and identified entities andkey phrases. The custom shape is called projectionShape and is parented under/document.One purpose of shaping is to ensure that all enrichment nodes are expressed in well-formed JSON, which is required for projecting into knowledge store.
